description.value: In combat, you favor the brutal weapons that are traditional for your orc ancestors. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Falchion]{Falchion} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Greataxe]{Greataxe}. In addition, you gain access to all uncommon orc weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial orc weapons are simple weapons and advanced orc weapons are martial weapons.
